stitch and are repeated repeat row 1 once more repeat last 4 row once more decrease row rs k132 k2tog k to end 264 sts repeat row 1 once more knit 2 row knit 3 row cast off knitwise *** cast off knitwise ** right side border lower border with rs facing and using 4mm circular needle and e for colourway 1 or c for colourway 2 beg at right side edge of blanket marker with rs facing and using 4mm needles and e for colourway 1 or c pick up and k2 sts along first 4 row of lower border 26 sts evenly for colourway 2 pick up and knit 192 sts evenly along cast on edge up part 1 texture panel 35 sts evenly up part 1 colourwork panel knit 3 row 26 sts evenly up part 2 texture panel 32 sts evenly up part 2 work as given for upper border from ** to ** colourwork panel 26 sts evenly up part 3 texture panel 35 sts evenly up part 3 colourwork panel 26 sts evenly up part 4 texture panel 35 sts evenly up part 4 colourwork panel and 2 sts evenly up left side border first 4 row of upper border to marker 245 sts work as given for left side border from *** to *** with rs facing and using 4mm circular needle and e for colourway 1 or c for colourway 2 beg at left side edge of blanket marker pick up and k2 sts evenly along first 4 row of upper border 35 sts evenly finishing down part 4 colourwork panel 26 sts evenly down part 4 texture panel 35 sts evenly down part 3 colourwork panel 26 sts evenly
